name: Format\Addition
description: Properties shared by all addition types.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of addition. For example, .

properties.name: rangeLength
properties.description: The number of text characters that will be highlighted as the link.

properties.name: rangeStart
properties.description:
The starting character index for which the addition is meant. A range starts at  for the first character.
If rangeStart is specified, rangeLength is required.
